text: ولو شئنا لبعثنا فى كل قرية نذيرا

translations.translation: If We had wished We could have sent a warner to every town.
Had We pleased We could have raised a warner in every town.
Had We willed, We would have raised up a separate Warner in each habitation.
Had We wanted We could have sent a Prophet to every town.
If We willed, We could have sent a Herald of Warning to every village.
And had We willed, We would have raised a warner in every town.
And if We had pleased We would certainly have raised a warner in every town.
If We had willed, We would have raised up in every city a warner.
If We willed, We could raise up a warner in every village.
If We had so wished, We might have sent a warner into every town,
And if We had willed, We would have raised up in each town a warner.
Had We wished, We would have sent a warner to every town.
Had it been Our Will, We could have sent a warner to every centre of population.
And had We willed, We would have raised a warner in every town.
Had it been Our will, We could have raised a warner in every village.
Had We willed, We could have sent to every town a warner.
And if We had willed, We could have sent into every city a warner.

[25:51] And had We willed, We could have sent forth in every town a warner, to threaten its inhabitants [with God’s chastisement]; instead We have sent you to the inhabitants of all towns as a warner for your reward to be a great one.

(If We willed, We could raise up) We could have sent (a warner) a warning messenger (in every village) to the people of every village. Instead, We have sent you to all mankind as a Messenger so that reward and honour will be all yours.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } من شدة بغيهم وكفرانهم { لَوْ شِئْنَا } وتعلق مشيئتنا؛ لإنذار كل منهم بمنذر مخصوص { لَبَعَثْنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ } من القرى نبياً { نَّذِيراً } [الفرقان: 51] ينذرهم عما هم عليه من الكفران والطغيان، ولكن بعثناك يا أكمل الرسل إلى كافتهم وعامتهم تعظيماً لشأنك وإجلالاً لك، فلك ألاَّ تعي من حمل أعباء رسالتنا وتبليغ ما أمرناك به، ولا تلتفت إلى مزخرفاتهم التي أرادوا أن يخدعوك بها

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: يقول الحق جل جلاله: { ولو شئنا لبَعَثْنَا في كل قريةٍ نذيراً } أي: رسولاً يُنذر أهلها، ولقسمنا النذر بينهم كما قسمنا المطر، فيخف عليك أعباء النبوة، ولكنا لم نشأ ذلك فحملناك ثقل نذارة جميع القرى، حسبما نطق به قوله تعالى:
